attributes.action: Check ALL lorries vans 4 immigrants on ferries/trains prior to disembarkation
attributes.background:
Another European regulation, French again shirk responsibility to security of a EU country by refusing to scan lorries for illegal immigrants bound for UK prior to boarding Ferry or train on the basis that it may cause the illegals harm
Refuse entry Return Lorry etc back 2 embarkation

rejection.details:
Petitions need to ask clearly for a specific action from the Government or Parliament. You could start a new petition asking clearly for the action you want to see. 

You'll also need to give your full name to start a petition.
